channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks for the Long Run? Setting the Record Straight
item.description: Stocks are a good investment long-term, providing that you dial in your expectations. New historical findings provide a richer, more complete understanding of international returns.

item.title: How much you can make as an information security analyst in each state
item.description: Washington, New York, and Iowa pay top dollar for information security analysts—up to $148,000 in annual salary.

item.title: Rethinking Retirement Planning Amidst Aging Demographic Frontiers
item.description: Forward-thinking approaches to policy and wealth management are needed to ensure a better financial future across generations and income brackets.

item.title: New York jury finds Trump guilty on all 34 felony counts in hush-money trial
item.description: A New York jury found him guilty of falsifying business records in a scheme to illegally influence the 2016 election through hush money payments to porn actor Stormy Daniels.

item.title: Book Review: The New World Economy in 5 Trends
item.description: A diligent economist and an eclectic bookworm serve up an analysis of megatrends that will have the greatest impact on economies and investments: innovation, productivity, climate, multiglobalization, debt, and aging.

item.title: Three Black men sue American Airlines, saying they were kicked off their flight after a random complaint about body odor
item.description: The lawsuit alleges that the men were ejected from the plane "without any valid reason, and solely based on their race."

item.title: Factor Strategies Belong in Your Completion Portfolio Toolkit
item.description: Why wouldn't you include factor strategies in your completion portfolio? A review of the two commonly used approaches for managing institutional assets highlights their symbiotic nature.

item.title: Hopes of a 10-year EV transition are ‘irrational’ pipe dreams because we don’t have enough battery materials—opening up a single copper mine takes 23 years
item.description: An expected copper shortage and mining industry dynamics are threatening to stop the EV transition in its tracks.

item.title: For the Analyst: Peer Benchmarking Methods to Improve Earnings Forecasts
item.description: Peer benchmarking is a vexing task for financial analysts but one that is critical for forecasting earnings. This straightforward measure can help find peers for relative performance, compensation, and valuation benchmarking.

item.title: Alexander Wang dropped a wild ad featuring doppelgängers for Taylor Swift, Beyoncé, and Kylie Jenner—'this video is diabolical'
item.description: Among the TikTok stars featured are Paige Niemann, Taylor Madison, and Ashley Leechin, who resemble Ariana Grande, Kylie Jenner, and Taylor Swift.
